n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the value of n:"))
nsq=n*n
a=array(0)
for(i in 1:nsq){
  a[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter a value:"))
}
brr=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  brr[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter a value:"))
}
m=matrix(a,ncol=n)
m
sum=0
for(i in 1:n)
  sum=sum+m[i,i]
print(c(sum,max(brr)))
